attributes.action: canvas for Susan Boyle to be allowed to appear on the Royal Command Performance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ms Boyle has won the admiration of people across the world for her talent and tenacity in Britain's Got Talent.  One of her ambitions was to sing before the Queen.  Although she was beaten into second place, her undoubted fame has earned her the right to be invited to perform before Her Majesty and it would be fitting for her to be offered this opportunity.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
